dcterms:creator: P.E. Black
T. Boland
dcterms:description: The Software Assurance Reference Dataset contains code of over 170,000 programs in various programming languages, representing test cases taken from a selection of 150 weaknesses, following the Common Weakness Enumeration (CWE). The test cases are labeled as 'good' or 'bad', indicating whether the respective weakness is present.
dcterms:title: Software Assurance Reference Dataset (SARD)

dcterms:creator: T. Boland
P.E. Black
dcterms:description: The Juliet Suite for v1.3 C/C++ contains 64,099 artificially generated test cases that primarily cover the use of the standard C library API for all platforms. It includes weaknesses in the form of CWEs.
dcterms:title: Juliet Suite for v1.3 C/C++

dcterms:creator: J. Zheng
J. Pang
X. Zhang
X. Zhou
M. Li
J. Wang
dcterms:description: This dataset categorizes vulnerability types based on the Common Weakness Enumeration (CWE) and is used for training models to detect vulnerabilities in binary code.
dcterms:title: Vulnerability types categorized by CWEs
